25f0a23f-0d35-4658-b309-65b2661f8fb2.description: The holder of this certificate has demonstrated an understanding of color theory and applications as it relates to color management. This knowledge may have been attained through attending a PRINTING United Alliance Color Management Boot Camp. Topics covered include Color theory, Additive vs. subtractive color space, CIE L*a*b*, Rendering intents, Color Management Pyramid, Spot color matching and verification.
25f0a23f-0d35-4658-b309-65b2661f8fb2.name: PRINTING United Alliance Qualified Digital Color Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Score 88% or better on an online assessment on color theory, targets, applications, and color management.
Score 88% or better on an online assessment on color theory, targets, applications, and color management.

94812587-0826-46f1-a387-77c8a7ead8d7.description: The holder of this certificate has demonstrated an understanding of color theory and applications as it relates to color management, and a method for maintaining consistent, predictable, and repeatable color using digital equipment. This knowledge may have been attained through previous training or experience or at an PRINTING United Alliance Color Management Boot Camp. Earner has submitted a print that has passed examination.
94812587-0826-46f1-a387-77c8a7ead8d7.name: PRINTING United Alliance Certified Digital Color Professional

Submit print that is measured for gray balance, spot colors, CMYK and RGB.

f8e1c05c-e730-4489-9c74-c78e1973a351.description: This certification tests an installer's ability to manage any vehicle wrap project, including the rivets and corrugated panels found on many box trucks or trailers. The installer has demonstrated their ability to properly install vinyl (from any manufacturer) on a vehicle with minimal stretch to reduce the opportunity for failure. They demonstrated the ability to properly clean and prep any surface, wrap rivets with minimal testing, and the ability to cut vinyl without cutting the surface below.
f8e1c05c-e730-4489-9c74-c78e1973a351.name: PDAA Vehicle & Fleet Wraps

badge_template_activities.title: Testing includes: 1) Deep channel install. 2) Rivet panel install. 3) Corrugated panel install. 4) Cut & Drop on Ford Transit door channel. 5) Window, and door handle. 6) Cut test. 7) Quarter panel wrap. 8) Partial bumper. All testing is done with vinyl supplied -- PDAA is vinyl agnostic so installer needs to work with what has been provided.

8c073db8-d8a4-47a7-86dc-2e821c4ab24c.description: The holder of this badge has been tested on knowledge of proper install techniques and has proficiency with the tools necessary to install any type of standard architectural film in a typical industry setting (retail stores, trade shows, banks, offices, etc.). The testing stations included, wall mural with inside and outside corners, round column, floor graphic, locker, rough surface, and wet/dry window application.
8c073db8-d8a4-47a7-86dc-2e821c4ab24c.name: PDAA Architectural Films (windows, walls, and floors)

badge_template_activities.title: The badge holder has demonstrated their proficiency on the following stations: wall mural with inside and outside corners, round column, floor graphic, locker, rough surface, and wet/dry window application. The installer will work with any film provided as PDAA is vinyl agnostic.

dd500c6b-7c0e-4f80-abef-bc4937c9e421.description: Color Management Professional®: Fundamentals offers the latest in color theory and applications in color, providing a strong educational foundation for color managing a graphics workflow. It is the perfect foundational course for any technical practitioner interested in a comprehensive understanding of a color managed graphics workflow.
dd500c6b-7c0e-4f80-abef-bc4937c9e421.name: Idealliance Color Management Professional® Fundamentals Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Color Management Professional®: Fundamentals offers the latest in color theory and applications in color, providing a strong educational foundation for color managing a graphics workflow. The successful candidate has gone through the course and passed the assessment with a score of 80% or greater.

ec266810-484f-4f17-b608-d087d6af4563.description: La persona que identifica este certificado ha demostrado comprensión de la teoría del color y sus aplicaciones en lo que se relaciona a la Gestión del Color Este conocimiento ha podido ser adquirido a través de su asistencia al campo de Entrenamiento sobre Gestión de Color (Boot Camp) que lleva a cabo la PRINTING United Alliance. Los tópicos incluidos en este entrenamiento son: Teoría del Color, Espacio de color aditivo versus substractivo, CIE*a*b*, la Pirámide de la Gestión de Color.
ec266810-484f-4f17-b608-d087d6af4563.name: PRINTING United Alliance Profesional En Color Digital Calificado

badge_template_activities.title: La persona certificada ha alcanzado una calificación mínima de 88% en una evaluación virtual sobre teoría del color, objetivos, aplicaciones y Gestión del Color.

e129ea6d-39bc-4d39-b38b-f5eb74e2c922.description: The holder of this certificate has demonstrated an advanced understanding of color theory and applications as it relates to color management. 2c12301c-e8ee-4d26-b41e-ae8056cb9210.description: O detentor deste certificado demonstrou compreensão da teoria e das aplicações da cor no que se refere ao gerenciamento de cores. Esse conhecimento pode ter sido obtido por ter participado do Boot Camp de gerenciamento de cores da PRINTING United Alliance. Os tópicos abordados incluem teoria da cor, espaço de cores aditivo vs. subtrativo, CIE L* a* b*, intenções de renderização, pirâmide de gerenciamento de cores, correspondência e verificação de cores especiais.

badge_template_activities.title: Conseguiu 88% ou mais na avaliação online sobre teoria da cor, alvos, aplicativos e gerenciamento de cores.
